title: How should I study for the first year of a B.Sc? - Quora

response.answer_text: You have don't worry about your study. It's simple, first to clear your decision when you take choose the department. Start a day you have following note in our class. Free time just recalls the notes. Time schedule, daily finishing work to calculate at home. You will study to comfortable place. Don't have fear. Ever day going the library then search for subject releated topic. Don't mackup your study,try to understand. You will get a more percentage in our collage. God bless you

STUDY method remains all the same- follow three D’S DEDICATION DEVOTION DOMINATION. how do you achieve them ? wow !! so simple though it looks but planning keep yourself fit by body and mindyou can be fit by ody through exercises of body- it could be sports guided by coach or yoga guided by coach again.once your body is fit you are full of energy for environment challenges.move to the next level of mindyou need to do meditation through a guided coachit will take half an hour of your daily schedule- 15 minuites for fitness or may be half an hour- say badminton or table tennisor yogathen for meditation a-nother thirty minuites.your mind is willing to take fresh virgin thoughts- syllabus of new course.you plan the branches and chapters at microlevel and star attacking with your free mind and guidanceall positive thoughts and study for may be 3–4 hours a day will make you dominating in your class at every test and semesters.isn’t that elementory.go and start now.
